column4: Hi! If someone can help me I have a question: Can I install UBUNTU on an external HD (on USB port) from a computer, and then put that HD with Ubuntu as main (internal) HD of another computer?   - if yes, how?
hi guys! I've a questionm should I post it here?
You probably could, but the Ubuntu probably won't be configured properly for the other computer.
It lets you run other operating systems within your operating system.
So, if you want to run Windows within Ubuntu, you can have it running in a window. I don't use VMware, I use something else.
